BRIDGE.name: Bridge of the Enterprise
BRIDGE.desc: You are standing on the bridge of the Enterprise. Lt. Commander Data is at Ops, and Wesley has the helm. Mr. Worf is barking something about Romulans, blah blah blah. You are intrigued about the conversation but decide to mind your own buisness.

READYROOM.name: Captain's Ready Room
READYROOM.desc: You are in the captain's ready room. Captain Picard is seated behind his desk, sipping an Earl Grey tea, hot. He looks stern and has a neutral facial expression.

items.desc: A type 1 phaser is on the captain's desk
items.take: You take the phaser while the captain isn't looking and slip it into your pocket... Oh, wait, your uniform doesn't have pockets. Looks like you have to hold it and sprint out before the captain notices.
